short.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: BoxRob  use your flexible forklift to load goods onto a truck . You can play on Chrome™! Popup and Offline!
short.am: BoxRob -  use your flexible forklift to load goods onto a truck  . You can play on Chrome™! Popup and Offline!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your goal in this game is to use your flexible forklift to load goods onto a truck. To successfully finish each level, you must gather all the boxes and place them in their designated positions. Certain levels are quite simple, requiring only driving around to collect the boxes. However, as you advance through the game, the levels progressively increase in difficulty.
**Noted: I have a button (unblocked games) to make it easier for users to access and explore more games on my website.
